1 - 1 modifies
variable v;
Select v such that Modifies(4, v)
x00, t00, y00
5000
2 - 1 affects

Select BOOLEAN such that Affects (1, 5)
FALSE
5000
3 - 1 affects

Select BOOLEAN such that Affects (2, 5)
FALSE
5000
4 - 1 affects

Select BOOLEAN such that Affects (3, 10)
FALSE
5000
5 - 1 affects
assign a; stmt s;
Select <a, s> such that Affects (a, s)
2 3, 3 5, 6 9, 6 10, 7 11, 9 11, 13 14, 24 25, 35 36, 46 47, 57 58, 68 69, 79 80, 90 91, 101 102, 112 113, 14 16, 25 27, 36 38, 47 49, 58 60, 69 71, 80 82, 91 93, 102 104, 113 115, 17 20, 28 31, 39 42, 50 53, 61 64, 72 75, 83 86, 94 97, 105 108, 116 119, 17 21, 28 32, 39 43, 50 54, 61 65, 72 76, 83 87, 94 98, 105 109, 116 120, 18 22, 29 33, 40 44, 51 55, 62 66, 73 77, 84 88, 95 99, 106 110, 117 121, 20 22, 31 33, 42 44, 53 55, 64 66, 75 77, 86 88, 97 99, 108 110, 119 121
5000
6 - 1 affects*
stmt s1, s2;
Select <s1, s2> such that Affects* (s1, s2)
2 3, 3 5, 2 5, 6 9, 6 10, 6 11, 7 11, 9 11, 13 14, 24 25, 35 36, 46 47, 57 58, 68 69, 79 80, 90 91, 101 102, 112 113, 14 16, 25 27, 36 38, 47 49, 58 60, 69 71, 80 82, 91 93, 102 104, 113 115, 13 16, 24 27, 35 38, 46 49, 57 60, 68 71, 79 82, 90 93, 101 104, 112 115, 17 20, 28 31, 39 42, 50 53, 61 64, 72 75, 83 86, 94 97, 105 108, 116 119, 17 21, 28 32, 39 43, 50 54, 61 65, 72 76, 83 87, 94 98, 105 109, 116 120, 17 22, 28 33, 39 44, 50 55, 61 66, 72 77, 83 88, 94 99, 105 110, 116 121, 18 22, 29 33, 40 44, 51 55, 62 66, 73 77, 84 88, 95 99, 106 110, 117 121, 20 22, 31 33, 42 44, 53 55, 64 66, 75 77, 86 88, 97 99, 108 110, 119 121

stmt s1, s2;
